Reference

All functions

adjust_calcium_for_albumin()

Adjust total calcium for albumin

calculate_bmi()

Calculate the body mass index (BMI, Quetelet index)

calculate_pulse_pressure()

Calculate pulse pressure

calculate_qtc()

Calculate the corrected QT interval (QTc)

estimate_bsa()

Estimate the body surface area (BSA)

estimate_gfr_ckdepi()

Estimate creatinine clearance and glomerular filtration rate using the CKD-EPI formula

estimate_gfr_cockcroft()

Estimate creatinine clearance and glomerular filtration rate using the Cockcroft-Gault formula

estimate_gfr_mdrd()

Estimate creatinine clearance and glomerular filtration rate using the MDRD formula

estimate_gfr_schwartz()

Estimate creatinine clearance and glomerular filtration rate using the Schwartz formula

estimate_ibw()

Estimate ideal body weight (IBW)

estimate_map()

Estimate the mean arterial pressure (MAP)

has_metabolic_syndrome_atpiii()

Determine presence of metabolic syndrome using updated NCEP ATPIII criteria

score_curb65()

Score community-acquired pneumonia severity using CURB-65

score_qsofa()

Score qSOFA in sepsis
